page.p: On the road to Phandalin, the party encounters a group of goblins led by a scout.
The entrance is guarded by goblins.
Klarg, a bugbear, leads the Cragmaw goblins from this chamber. He has taken Sildar Hallwinter prisoner.
Klarg wears a tattered cloak and wields a morningstar. He is accompanied by his pet wolf, Ripper.
page.stat_block: BUGBEAR Medium humanoid (goblinoid), chaotic evil Armor Class 16 (hide armor, shield) Hit Points 27 (5d8 + 5) Challenge 1 (200 XP)

page.p: Sildar Hallwinter is a human fighter and member of the Lords' Alliance. He was escorting Gundren Rockseeker to Phandalin when they were ambushed by goblins. Sildar knows that Gundren was taken to Cragmaw Castle but doesn't know where it is.
page.stat_block: HUMAN FIGHTER Medium humanoid (human), lawful good Armor Class 17 (chain mail) Hit Points 32 (5d8 + 10) Challenge 2 (450 XP)
